summary: Choose from 30 colors of eyes for the Child race.
descriptionHtml:
Child Eye Colors - 30 Variations (beta version 1)

by Vergis, AKA VirusType2, 12-25-2011

UPDATE COMING WITH THE WEEK

*This mod requires a playable child race mod, details at the bottom of the page.*


This mod allows you to change the default \'brown\' eye color of the child race, to a color of your choosing.  For the sake of completion, I went ahead and provided all eye options (with the exception of the beast races)

Orc and Elf eyes may not look appropriate, but that\'s a matter of opinion.

I have added a screenshot of all eyes, for an general idea of what they will look like. 


NOTES ON USE:
To try a different eye type, just overwrite the file with an alternate. For this purpose I copy, instead of move the file, in case I want to use it again later.

The file goes here:
skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/eyeschild.nif

To uninstall, just delete eyeschild.nif, and Skyrim will use the default again, just like any other mesh replacer.


I wanted to try many different colors, so here we are.

I have set them to light grey (Image 1), by default. The alternative colors are in the .zip archive.

Testing lots of variations can be time consuming; your best bet is to go with something normal. Orc and Elf eyes may not look ... human. Blues, greens, greys, hazels should look nice. Dark Elf purple works well.

It should be possible to have more variation in children in the future, if each child is created as an entirely new race. We will have to see when the Creation Kit comes out.


*This mod requires a playable child race mod, CHOOSE 1:

- Killable Children by Xylozi
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=774

- Playable childs and Dremora races by Sagittarius22
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=817

- Playable children race by SpyderMoHawK
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1066


You will also want:

-Playable child clothes for child characters, by DeadlyKris 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4148


> For more information on how to even have a chance in surviving, go here: http://childrenofcyrodiil.com/forums/index.php?topic=1896.0

author: VirusType2 AKA Vergis
